name: Roll Call - Assembly Drill
longDescription: We know, we know—the logistical stuff. But don't worry, we've even given this the Virgin makeover. Roll Call will cover everything you need to know in case of an emergency while on board—who to call, what to do and where to go. To ensure a quick experience, please watch the very Virgin safety video in the VV app or the TV in your cabin before you arrive at Roll Call. Trust us. It's a can't-miss event. Literally. Legally. No, seriously!
needToKnows: This is required
Please watch the safety vid on on your app or on your cabin television.

name: Let’s Set Sail: Solo Sailor Meetup
longDescription: Join us at this exclusive meetup for our seafaring solo explorers, hosted by our effervescent Happenings Cast. Say bon voyage to the coastline as you toast to the endless possibilities at sea.

name: Let's Set Sail
longDescription: As we push away from shore and embark on an unforgettable voyage, we’ll be celebrating this electric moment as we make moves out to sea. Listening for the ship’s blast as we pull away from the terminal, our DJs will elevate the mood with some synergetic dance tracks, bottles of bubbles will start popping, and endless ocean views will transform into a blanket of stars — your epic sea change starts now.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Golden Hour Grooves at The Dock
longDescription: Head to the Dock for the perfect mix of chill and groove as our DJ spins a mix designed to complement the day, and ease you into the night.

name: Festival Stage: Tymon Shipp
longDescription: Ty Shipp is a dynamic stand-up comedian whose performances blend razor-sharp observational humor with captivating storytelling drawn from his life experiences on and off stage. With over three decades in comedy, he masterfully turns everyday situations—family, relationships, aging, travel, and cultural shifts—into universal laughs that connect with audiences of all backgrounds.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

name: Guest Artist: Selkii
longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.

name: Happy Holidays with The Hostess & Friends
longDescription: Join the Hostess at this new cabaret show, featuring special guests and performances by onboard celebs. So get ready for a night of your favorite (secular) holiday tunes, and prepare to leave full of festive spirit.

name: Salty Trivia: Know-It-All
longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. Each team will have a booklet to fill out for each round of 10 questions. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book,"  it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

name: Holiday Grog Walk at Sip Lounge ($ USD) - Book On Board!
The Diva Goes West
longDescription: The Diva ropes cowboys and cowgirls in for a wild hoedown like no other with audience participation moments like bronco riding and a lasso tossing contest. The over the top antics and quick witted banter keep the laughs coming, while the Diva's sensational vocals and your favorite country hits will have you fixin' to get up and dance.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

name: Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

name: Ugly Sweater PJ Party
longDescription: At this pajama party, the name of the game is comfort. Throw your most fabulously hideous holiday sweater over your PJs and use it as a conversation starter during your night of revelry with new friends or best friends. Surprises will unravel throughout the night — and there's plenty of comfy places to lounge, so snag a spot to cool off between dance numbers.

name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

name: Speed Puzzle — Holiday Edition
longDescription: All your years of training with an enormous cat puzzle on your aunt's kitchen table are about to pay off. In this spirited (but friendly) competition, you and your teammates will take on one of two different holiday-themed jigsaw puzzles — 300 pieces each — and race to see who figures it out first, with a soundtrack of live color commentary provided by our onboard Gamer. The winning team will be crowned the Voyage's reigning Puzzle Masters.

name: Stretch & Flow Serenity with The Balancer
longDescription: This easy-to-follow movement and stretching session class is designed to help you loosen up those tight muscles and drift into a state of deep relaxation. Guided by the soothing music of today’s best artists, you'll gently flow through stretches. Perfect for anyone looking to de-stress, this class invites you to journey into a world of tranquility where every breath and movement leads to a new level of calm. Let go, stretch out, and find your peace in this blissful escape.

name: Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

name: Pop Princess Showdown
longDescription: Unleash your inner video vixen with this hour long class taught by our amazing Happenings cast. You’ll get to learn either the choreo from Britney Spears’ “Oops I Did it Again” or Christina Aguilera’s “Genie in a Bottle.” Then you’ll get to show off our movies with your very own video to prove to family and friends you totally could have been a Spice Girl if you had the chance.

name: Postcards at Sea: Sent with Love
longDescription: Just like sailors of the past, sending postcards across the ocean has long been a cherished seafaring tradition. Hosted by the Happenings Cast, here you'll design your own postcard, a keepsake to remember this incredible voyage, or a cheeky note to make someone back home just a little jealous.
needToKnows: This is a drop-in event, and you’re welcome to arrive at your convenience.
Please note that the last admittance is 15 minutes before the event ends to ensure you have the best possible experience.

name: Pickleball
longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

name: Line Dancing: Boot Scootin' Bash with the Diva!
longDescription: Get down with the Happenings Cast and the Diva! Break out your Levi’s and belt buckles for this lively Line Dancing bash full of your favorite moves, and catchiest tunes.

name: Kickbox Cardio Blast with The Balancer
longDescription: This fun equipment-free Kickbox Cardio class combines the power of kickboxing with the intensity of cardio to help you burn calories, tone muscles, and improve your endurance. Perfect for all fitness levels, each session is packed with exciting, easy-to-follow routines, and offer modifications to ensure everyone can participate. With a mix of punches, kicks, and bodyweight exercises, you'll leave feeling empowered, energized, and ready to take on anything!

name: Loteria Gigante ($ USD) - Book On Board
Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. name: DJ James Campbell at Aquatic Club
longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.

name: Retail Rumble
longDescription: Get ready for the most chaotic shopping showdown at sea. Packed with fun, Retail Rumble highlights the incredible items available from the shops on High Street, and turns them into the stuff of legends. Join the madness, cheer on your team, and brace yourself: retail has never been this ridiculous.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Keep your hands to yourself!  NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
And just FYI, in case it may be an issue for anyone, fog effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.

name: Suitcase of Secrets - Book on Board! $$
Delight Trio
longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

name: Gotta Dodge 'Em All
longDescription: After laying out the rules, the games begin and teams begin to be eliminated with each passing round. A member of your Happenings Cast will host this event, and announce the victor at the end of the match. Gotta. Dodge. 'Em. All.
needToKnows: Wear close-toed shoes and athletic clothes (because... sports)
In case it in isn't obvious, you will, in fact, be hit with balls.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Pop Quiz: 70s Music Trivia
longDescription: From funk to Fleetwood, glam rock to disco fever, get ready to boogie through a wild ride of ‘70s music trivia that’ll have your brain hustlin’ and your hips twitchin’. It’s a far-out flashback to the decade of bell bottoms, big hair, and even bigger hits. Whether you're a soul sister, a rock ‘n’ roll rebel, or just here for the glitter and grooves, this trivia trip will test your tune knowledge and keep you stayin’ alive all night long.

name: Pairs and Paints! - Book On Board! $
Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

name: Hot Seat
longDescription: Hot Seat is Virgin Voyages’ most unhinged dating game show. One bold Sailor takes the throne to meet three mystery contestants. With spicy questions and unexpected twists, they’ll test vibes and pick their match. Whether you're in the spotlight or watching in disbelief, Hot Seat is all about fun, flirtation, and the messy magic of love at sea because love is a game... and the truth is always optional.

name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

Whether you’re vibing to vintage rock, belting out a diva ballad, or jamming to pop gold, this high-energy quiz is the ultimate music throwdown. Bragging rights? Legendary. Bonus points for dance moves.

name: Salty Trivia: Planet Please
longDescription: From black holes to blue whales, “Salty Trivia: Planet Please” blasts off on a brainy adventure through all things science and nature. Expect curious creatures, mind-blowing space facts, wild weather, and a splash of chemistry (the science kind, not the flirting kind… unless?). Whether you’re a nature nerd or just here to orbit some fun, this quiz is your chance to flex that big beautiful brain of yours. Warning: may cause a sudden urge to watch a documentary.

longDescription: Set sail on a core-strengthening adventure with Pilates by the Sea, a nautical-themed Pilates class. Flow through low-impact movements designed to tone, lengthen, and stabilize. Inspired by the rhythm of the ocean, this class engages deep core muscles, improves posture, and enhances flexibility while transporting you to a seaside state of mind. Whether you’re a land lover or sea explorer, all levels are welcome aboard. So drop anchor, find your balance, and get ready to plank like a pirate!
needToKnows: Yoga Mat available at location.

name: Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia
longDescription: From Beatlemania to Britpop and beyond, this is your moment to salute the UK hitmakers who stormed the American charts. "Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia" celebrates the British invasion(s) that had the world singing from powerhouse vocals to unforgettable anthems. Test your knowledge of the artists who waved the Union Jack all the way to number one. Cheeky, chart-topping, and oh-so-Virgin this is trivia with a British accent and a global legacy.

name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

name: Keep Calm and Color On
longDescription: Vacation should always include some relaxation, and what better way than to revisit the childhood favorite of coloring! Pick your medium of choice and and let your inner kid run wild!

name: Solo Salty Trivia
longDescription: Here at Virgin, we love our Trivia! And you don’t need a team to prove just how smart you are. Take on this new twist of Salty Trivia where you face off against other masterful trivia minds in the ultimate solo show down!

name: Guest Artists: Soulo Lyon Trio
longDescription: Roots-rock meets hip-hop meets reggae-soul — can you keep up? It doesn’t matter because when Soulo Lyon Trio takes over, you’ll groove, move, and experience a multitude of rhythms that allow for chilled out dancing to laid back lounging — creating the perfect soundscape all day to all night long.

name: Duets
longDescription: Get your swing on with the vocalists and band from Up With a Twist as they recreate classic and contemporary duets from the genres of pop, R&B, Soul, and even country into jazz-infused takes.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
Standby line will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.

name: "Great Minds" Game Show
longDescription: The great thing about a cruise is meeting people from all over the world. What better way to really get acquainted with your fellow Sailors than by playing this trivia game, focusing on international countries and cities? You'll be challenged to think like the Sailor sitting next to you in this multi-round game of majority rules, with a chance to bring home the top prize.

name: Duel Reality
longDescription: Created and produced by The 7 Fingers, Duel Reality is a fast-paced retelling of Romeo and Juliet—with an elaborate circus twist. By stripping this love story down to the core of its conflict and dropping the action into a sporting arena, both the thrills and the danger are heightened. You'll have ringside seats to the graceful and death-defying acts while witnessing the two groups grapple with a heart-pounding desire to rise above one another.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
For safety, Deck 6 access will be prohibited once the show has begun. If you arrive late, you must use the Deck 7 entrance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.

name: Delight Trio
longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).

name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

name: Club Night Featuring Queen HD the DJ
longDescription: Queen HD The DJ is a high-energy, self-taught Baltimore DJ known for sharp scratching and nostalgic grooves. She’s battled in NYC, DC, and Atlanta, and DJed globally from London to Botswana. She’s the official DJ for the Washington Spirit, spun for Team USA Soccer, and made history as the first queer Black woman to DJ on the White House South Lawn. Expect an electrifying set that blends nostalgia with unstoppable energy.

name: The Stitch Up - Book On Board!
Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

name: VHS Volume 4: Jukebox Jive
longDescription: Step into a retro-fueled workout with Jukebox Jive! This high-energy, tongue-in-cheek dance class drops Sailors into a pastel-hued, jukebox-fuelled workout inspired by 1950s swing, jive and rock ‘n’ roll. Put a nickel in the Jukebox and get ready to sweat, with our Happenings Cast, through this cult-favorite class with a time-warped twist!
needToKnows: Wear something to move in and close-toed shoes.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Keep your hands to yourself!  NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

name: Pickleball
longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

name: Roaming Magic with The Charmer
longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.

name: The Gold Rush Gamble - The Buy In
longDescription: The Gold Rush Gamble is a high-stakes, pay-to-play adventure where trivia, tactics, and sabotage collide! Buy in with your gold for a shot at winning more. From bandits to loose mine-carts, all are welcome just be quick! Buy-ins close before the rush begins. Come on down, take your shot, and strike it rich!
needToKnows: Buy in starts 30 minutes prior to the event.
Buy in ends 5 minutes prior to the event.
There is a cost to play.
This event is first come, first served.

name: Dance Class: Broadway Boogie
longDescription: If you ever dreamed of performing famous choreography from top musicals, your dream is about to come true. Enter the stage door as the Balancers breaks down the moves, the counts, and star studded attitude needed to perform like the professionals. This class Can't Stop the Beat, and will have you feeling that Fame and glory!

name: The Gold Rush Gamble
longDescription: The Gold Rush Gamble is a high-stakes, pay-to-play adventure where trivia, tactics, and sabotage collide. Teams battle through Klondike-inspired challenges to earn mining rights on a giant gameboard filled with golden nuggets, cursed relics, jackpots, and traps. Roll the dice, dig for riches, or trigger chaos. With real cash on the line and only one team taking home the prize, it’s a thrilling mix of brains, luck, and betrayal. Will you strike it rich or lose it all in the dust?
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
There is a charge for this event.
Entry into the Gamble is only available for purchase in the 30 minutes leading up to the event, and will be done in the event space.

name: Kickbox Cardio Blast with The Balancer
longDescription: This fun equipment-free Kickbox Cardio class combines the power of kickboxing with the intensity of cardio to help you burn calories, tone muscles, and improve your endurance. Perfect for all fitness levels, each session is packed with exciting, easy-to-follow routines, and offer modifications to ensure everyone can participate. With a mix of punches, kicks, and bodyweight exercises, you'll leave feeling empowered, energized, and ready to take on anything!

name: Bingo Card Sales
longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

name: The Charmer's Lounge
longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by impromptu illusions, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you to the show. Or maybe it’s simply your charms that charm The Charmer.
needToKnows: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

name: Bingo with the Hostess
longDescription: Because the Hostess is ready to play. Grab a card (or a few) and make yourself comfortable for a glamorous game of bingo hosted by the most fabulous person on board. Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event and end 15 minutes prior to the event.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.

name: Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

name: The Voyager's Collection: The Finale
longDescription: You’ve spent the voyage collecting stamps and stories, now it’s time to reveal your Atlas. Join the Happenings Cast for the finale of The Voyager’s Collection and show us how many faces and places you discovered. Sailors who’ve charted every destination and filled their Atlas will earn a special keepsake to commemorate your journey.

name: Mix It Up ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

longDescription: Welcome to the most fabulous crime scene of the decade. Murder in the Manor isn’t just a show— murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and dripping with drama. Beneath the shoulder pads and smoky eye lies a deadly secret… and everyone’s a suspect. With over-the-top dance numbers, savage twists, and synth-pop bangers that refuse to die prepare for a glamorously gory night you won’t forget. This isn’t just a whodunit—it’s a who’s-next.

name: The Myth of Scarlet Night
longDescription: Okay...so you get it. Scarlet Night is important, we've made that clear. But... what is it exactly? We like to keep it fun and mysterious so that all the incredible surprises, well, surprise you. That being said, the story behind Scarlet Night is enchanting, so if you want to learn about the myth of our lady ship's most important night, you can join members of our Happenings cast to make sure you get the most out of your Scarlet Night.

name: VV Cabaret: Featuring the Diva
longDescription: As the ship's grand jewel, the Diva from the Happenings Cast knows how to command attention and captivate audiences. Adorned in her finest drag, this performance is one you won’t want to miss. Enjoy a cocktail at the bar, relax, and let the magic unfold. Sing along, sway to the rhythm, and snap your fingers to the beat - our Diva promises to provide some unforgettable entertainment!
needToKnows: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.

needToKnows: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.

name: Scarlet Night
longDescription: On every voyage, there's one night that reigns supreme above the rest. Welcome to Scarlet Night — an immersive celebration of the fabled love between the mysterious Goddess of the Sea and the Sailor who won her heart. Throughout Deck 7 and the Roundabout on Deck 6, the ship is transformed into a menagerie of delights and epic dance moves. Through pop-up performances, interactive games, karaoke, myth-telling, and live music, come pay tribute to a love that washed the world scarlet.
needToKnows: Red is a must.
The adventurous will be rewarded.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
This event will be recorded as part of a marketing production that will be used for commercial advertising.
Your attendance confirms your consent for us to use your name, image and/or persona in some or all of our marketing or promotional materials.
Materials which may be in print, on television, on our website, on our social media sites, or other media.

name: The Octopus Garden: The Story of Scarlet Night
longDescription: The Octopus Goddess welcomes you to her garden on our epic Scarlet Night. Learn straight from the Octopus' mouth about the myth and story behind Scarlet Night's origins — the world's most romantic love story.
needToKnows: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.

name: Karaoke with the Diva
longDescription: It’s Scarlet Night dahlings — where everybody is a star, so show off your vocal, lyrical, or harmonious talents during karaoke with the Diva herself. Everyone has their go-to song so whether you want to belt out your high-octave emotions Mariah-style, take a chance as a rapper, or keep us believing that this is a real journey of a lifetime, lose yourself in the moment — and own it — cause this opportunity comes once in a Scarlet Night.

name: Delight Trio
longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

name: The Octopus Garden: The Story of Scarlet Night
longDescription: The Octopus Goddess welcomes you to her garden on our epic Scarlet Night. Learn straight from the Octopus' mouth about the myth and story behind Scarlet Night's origins — the world's most romantic love story.
needToKnows: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.

name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

name: Scarlet Night Hip-Hop Afterparty
longDescription: Scarlet Night isn't over until the Octogodess says it is over so make your way to the Manor dance floor for a mix of Urban music drops that spans generations of hip-hop, reggae, afrobeat, reggaeton, soca, and more.

name: Salty Trivia: Around the World
longDescription: Think you know your capitals from your coastlines? "Salty Trivia: Around The World" takes you on a whirlwind tour of global wonders, wild facts, and geographic curveballs. From iconic landmarks to cultural gems and off-the-map surprises, this quiz will challenge even the savviest sailor. No need to pack a bag, just bring your brain, a bit of wanderlust, and a taste for trivia glory. Let the journey begin.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Mat Pilates with The Balancer
longDescription: Set sail on a core-strengthening adventure with Pilates by the Sea, a nautical-themed Pilates class. Flow through low-impact movements designed to tone, lengthen, and stabilize. Inspired by the rhythm of the ocean, this class engages deep core muscles, improves posture, and enhances flexibility while transporting you to a seaside state of mind. Whether you’re a land lover or sea explorer, all levels are welcome aboard. So drop anchor, find your balance, and get ready to plank like a pirate!
needToKnows: Yoga Mat available at location.

name: Postcards at Sea: Sent with Love
longDescription: Just like sailors of the past, sending postcards across the ocean has long been a cherished seafaring tradition. Hosted by the Happenings Cast, here you'll design your own postcard, a keepsake to remember this incredible voyage, or a cheeky note to make someone back home just a little jealous.
needToKnows: This is a drop-in event, and you’re welcome to arrive at your convenience.
Please note that the last admittance is 15 minutes before the event ends to ensure you have the best possible experience.

name: Pickleball
longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

name: Pop Quiz: 70s Music Trivia
longDescription: From funk to Fleetwood, glam rock to disco fever, get ready to boogie through a wild ride of ‘70s music trivia that’ll have your brain hustlin’ and your hips twitchin’. It’s a far-out flashback to the decade of bell bottoms, big hair, and even bigger hits. Whether you're a soul sister, a rock ‘n’ roll rebel, or just here for the glitter and grooves, this trivia trip will test your tune knowledge and keep you stayin’ alive all night long.

name: Guest Artists: Soulo Lyon Trio
longDescription: Roots-rock meets hip-hop meets reggae-soul — can you keep up? It doesn’t matter because when Soulo Lyon Trio takes over, you’ll groove, move, and experience a multitude of rhythms that allow for chilled out dancing to laid back lounging — creating the perfect soundscape all day to all night long.

name: Salty Trivia: History Happens
longDescription: Time travel without jet lag. "Salty Trivia: History Happens" takes you on a whirlwind ride through epic events, wild moments, and legendary figures who changed the game. From ancient empires to modern milestones, it’s your chance to flex those historical smarts and uncover the drama behind the dates. Think of it as a history lesson only way saltier, sassier, and packed with trivia twists. Because the past isn’t boring… It's bold.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.

name: Festival Stage: Tymon Shipp
longDescription: Ty Shipp is a dynamic stand-up comedian whose performances blend razor-sharp observational humor with captivating storytelling drawn from his life experiences on and off stage. With over three decades in comedy, he masterfully turns everyday situations—family, relationships, aging, travel, and cultural shifts—into universal laughs that connect with audiences of all backgrounds.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

name: Murder in the Manor
longDescription: Welcome to the most fabulous crime scene of the decade. Murder in the Manor isn’t just a show— murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and dripping with drama. Beneath the shoulder pads and smoky eye lies a deadly secret… and everyone’s a suspect. With over-the-top dance numbers, savage twists, and synth-pop bangers that refuse to die prepare for a glamorously gory night you won’t forget. This isn’t just a whodunit—it’s a who’s-next.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.

name: Majority Mayhem
longDescription: Join the Happenings Cast for a fun game of Majority Mayhem! Answer lighthearted questions on whiteboard paddles, then reveal your responses to see which answer is the most popular. It’s not about being right — it’s about matching the crowd! A great way to laugh, connect, and meet fellow Sailors. Spectators are welcome to join in the fun too!

name: Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

name: On The Rocks DJ Take-Over
longDescription: Get ready for a groovy night as our DJ transforms the intimate On The Rocks stage into a high-energy soundscape. Blending crowd favorites with unexpected gems across genres, every beat is designed to elevate the mood and keep the party moving.

name: REMIX'd Dance Class
longDescription: This remixed dance class is all about getting your feet moving and putting you in the party mindset. Learn 2-step dances like the cha cha, the grapevine, and other adult-friendly moves, grooving to music that's sure to keep the deck bopping.

name: Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

name: Let’s Mushroom Around - Book On Board!
Pickleball
longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. name: Latin Dance Class 101
longDescription: It doesn’t matter if you’re a constant wallflower or if rhythm just pulsates through your veins — it’s time to hit the deck by learning (or improving) sensational dance skills. This partners-optional sesh gives you the chance to meet new people in a judgment-free zone that celebrates music, dance, and of course, the Latin spirit. After a warm up, you’ll learn the basics followed by Salsa or Bachata — and after a few minutes, you’ll feel like you’ve been dancing all your life in no time.

name: Roaming Magic with The Charmer
longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.

name: Salty Trivia: Planet Please
longDescription: From black holes to blue whales, “Salty Trivia: Planet Please” blasts off on a brainy adventure through all things science and nature. Expect curious creatures, mind-blowing space facts, wild weather, and a splash of chemistry (the science kind, not the flirting kind… unless?). Whether you’re a nature nerd or just here to orbit some fun, this quiz is your chance to flex that big beautiful brain of yours. Warning: may cause a sudden urge to watch a documentary.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Keep Calm and Color On
longDescription: Vacation should always include some relaxation, and what better way than to revisit the childhood favorite of coloring! Pick your medium of choice and and let your inner kid run wild!

name: Shuffleboard Showdown
longDescription: Proud of your shuffleboard skills? Or maybe you're just looking for some competitive practice? Head down to the Social Club for a shuffleboard tournament, where you'll compete in teams of two in multiple rounds of Knock Off. See who has the best strategy to come out on top, and bring home a special prize from our Happenings Cast.

name: Guest Artist: Selkii
longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.

name: Ship Hop with the Balancer
longDescription: Get ready to hit the dance floor and unleash your inner star! This electrifying class will have everyone feeling like a pop star, boy band sensation, hip-hop icon, or video vixen. With high-energy beats and easy-to-follow choreography, you'll groove, pop, and lock to the rhythm of your favorite hip-hop and pop hits. Whether you're a seasoned dancer or just love to move, this class is all about dancing like no one’s watching.

name: The Big Remix
longDescription: This isn’t your average trivia, it's The Big Remix. A wild, high-energy music game show where Sailors face off in rounds like “Music Time Machine” and “Boogie For The Record.” Expect lyric lies, cover chaos, and remix mayhem in a pop culture battle of memory, music, and madness.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
And just FYI, in case it may be an issue for anyone, fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted — strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.

name: Queen HD the DJ at the Aquatic Club
longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.

name: Latte, You Stay!
longDescription: The Roundabout is center stage for this battle royale for a free spiked latte and the grand title of Grounds Master. Four lucky Sailors will be plucked from the crowd to participate in a series of coffee-related challenges, ranging from trivia to walking the runway with a hot latte in hand. You'll even work with a barista to create the wildest custom foam art imaginable. The Sailor with the most beans* in their cup** (points* on their board**) at the end of the game wins the coveted prize.

name: Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

name: Painting & Boozy Bevvies: ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Golden Hour Grooves at The Dock
longDescription: Head to the Dock for the perfect mix of chill and groove as our DJ spins a mix designed to complement the day, and ease you into the night.

name: Horseplay Race
longDescription: And by races, we mean our faux-horse track, complete with seahorses. Dust off your Derby best and come cheer on your favorite (sea)horse. After the dice are rolled, the owners are tasked with a variety of challenges or given the option to spin the wheel and compete to move the seahorses forward. It’s ridiculous, it’s wild and in the end, there can only be one winner.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.

name: Pop Quiz: Decade's Music Trivia
longDescription: Think you know your modern chart-toppers? Step up and show off in this pop-fueled quiz packed with iconic hits, unforgettable hooks, and serious sing-along energy. From viral bangers to powerhouse vocals and everything in between, it’s a celebration of the songs you can’t stop streaming. Whether you’re a music buff or just love a good beat drop, this is your moment to shine. No throwbacks here, just pure, current pop brilliance.

name: VV Cabaret: Featuring the Hostess
longDescription: As you sip your favorite drink, immerse yourself in an electric atmosphere brought to life by the fabulous Hostess from your Happenings Cast. Featuring a captivating collection of songs and stories, this experience offers the perfect blend of entertainment and elegance aboard our stylish lady ship.
needToKnows: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

name: Salty Trivia: Musicals, Darling!
longDescription: From Broadway belters to West End wonders, "Salty Trivia: Musicals, Darling" is your all-singing, all-dancing chance to shine. Test your knowledge of iconic show tunes, legendary performers, and toe-tapping trivia from the stage’s biggest hits. Whether you’re a theatre nerd, drama queen, or just here for the jazz hands, this glittering game will leave you humming for more. So warm up those vocal cords it’s showtime, baby!
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Duel Reality
longDescription: Created and produced by The 7 Fingers, Duel Reality is a fast-paced retelling of Romeo and Juliet—with an elaborate circus twist. By stripping this love story down to the core of its conflict and dropping the action into a sporting arena, both the thrills and the danger are heightened. You'll have ringside seats to the graceful and death-defying acts while witnessing the two groups grapple with a heart-pounding desire to rise above one another.

name: Arts & Crafts - Holiday Edition
longDescription: Hang out with your fellow Sailors and decorate a festive ornament to remember your holiday voyage by — something besides your tan, hundreds of photos, and warm, fuzzy feelings, that is.

name: Speed Puzzle — Holiday Edition
longDescription: All your years of training with an enormous cat puzzle on your aunt's kitchen table are about to pay off. In this spirited (but friendly) competition, you and your teammates will take on one of two different holiday-themed jigsaw puzzles — 300 pieces each — and race to see who figures it out first, with a soundtrack of live color commentary provided by our onboard Gamer. The winning team will be crowned the Voyage's reigning Puzzle Masters.

name: Guest Artist: Taylor Reed
longDescription: Hailing from Tampa, FL, Taylor Reed channels her natural creativity and spontaneity through a looping station, building an elegantly layered, engrossingly soulful sound. Weaving violin melodies, bold and invigorating percussion, and angelic vocals through groove-infused creations, her pop/R&B music elevates any space.

name: Pop Quiz: 00s Music Trivia
longDescription: Grab your low-rise jeans and flip phones, it’s time to relive the era of pop princesses, emo anthems, and ringtone chart-toppers. "Pop Quiz: Back To The 00’s" is a nostalgic trivia bash celebrating the unforgettable bangers, breakout stars, and guilty pleasures of the new millennium. From boy bands to indie icons, test your knowledge of the decade that gave us big hooks, bold looks, and endless vibes. No dial-up required, just all-out pop glory.

name: Festival Stage: Tom Crosbie
longDescription:
Tom has made a living for the last 10 years traveling the world with his collection of completely useless skills. This promises to be a funny & charming show from one of Britain's most in demand variety stars! With a show that will be like nothing you've ever seen before, join Tom as he takes the scenic route to self-improvement, as he masters the talents nobody knew he needed.

"One of the most incredible things I've ever watched!" - Simon Cowell
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
This is a show that will be performed throughout the voyage.

name: Delight Trio
longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

name: Salty Trivia: History Happens
longDescription: Time travel without jet lag. "Salty Trivia: History Happens" takes you on a whirlwind ride through epic events, wild moments, and legendary figures who changed the game. From ancient empires to modern milestones, it’s your chance to flex those historical smarts and uncover the drama behind the dates. Think of it as a history lesson only way saltier, sassier, and packed with trivia twists. Because the past isn’t boring… It's bold.

The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.

name: Duets
longDescription: Get your swing on with the vocalists and band from Up With a Twist as they recreate classic and contemporary duets from the genres of pop, R&B, Soul, and even country into jazz-infused takes.

name: Pop Quiz: Through the Ages Music Trivia
longDescription: Get ready to strut through the soundtrack of time. "Hits Through The Ages" is your all-access trivia pass to the most unforgettable songs across eras. From timeless anthems to guilty pleasures, test your knowledge of the tracks that defined generations. Whether you’re vibing to vintage rock, belting out a diva ballad, or jamming to pop gold, this high-energy quiz is the ultimate music throwdown. Bragging rights? Legendary. Bonus points for dance moves.

name: Guest Artist: Selkii
longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.

name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

name: Club Night Featuring Queen HD the DJ
longDescription: Queen HD The DJ is a high-energy, self-taught Baltimore DJ known for sharp scratching and nostalgic grooves. She’s battled in NYC, DC, and Atlanta, and DJed globally from London to Botswana. She’s the official DJ for the Washington Spirit, spun for Team USA Soccer, and made history as the first queer Black woman to DJ on the White House South Lawn. Expect an electrifying set that blends nostalgia with unstoppable energy.

name: Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

name: Feel the Beat: Zumba Class
longDescription: If dragging yourself to the gym just isn't how you want to spend your Virgin Voyage but you’d like to break a sweat, this event is for you. Zumba is more party than fitness class, set to a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout. Developed in Colombia, this method combines low-intensity and high-intensity moves for an interval-style, calorie-burning dance party. It's every bit as feel-good as an 80s music video, but the leotard is optional.

name: Speed Puzzle — Holiday Edition
longDescription: All your years of training with an enormous cat puzzle on your aunt's kitchen table are about to pay off. In this spirited (but friendly) competition, you and your teammates will take on one of two different holiday-themed jigsaw puzzles — 300 pieces each — and race to see who figures it out first, with a soundtrack of live color commentary provided by our onboard Gamer. The winning team will be crowned the Voyage's reigning Puzzle Masters.

name: Pickleball
longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

name: Roaming Magic with The Charmer
longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.

name: Dance the Decades
longDescription: Nothing beats the classics. They're called the greatest hits for a reason, so prepare to learn some new moves and dance the night away to your favorite songs. From the Roaring 20's to a vibrant mix of nostalgic 2000's tunes, you'll be humming these hits to yourself for the rest of the voyage.

name: Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

name: Strength & Conditioning with The Balancer
longDescription: This challenging Strength & Conditioning class is designed to push expert gym-goers while nurturing and guiding novice participants. We combine functional strength training with high-intensity conditioning exercises to build muscle, boost endurance, and enhance overall fitness. The dynamic and exciting music will keep you driven and motivated. Whether you're a seasoned athlete or a beginner, this class offers something for everyone. Get ready to sweat, grow, and leave feeling stronger than ever!

name: Beyond Tequila: Rituals and Stories of a Mezcalier ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Bingo Card Sales
longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

name: The Diva Goes West
longDescription: The Diva ropes cowboys and cowgirls in for a wild hoedown like no other with audience participation moments like bronco riding and a lasso tossing contest. The over the top antics and quick witted banter keep the laughs coming, while the Diva's sensational vocals and your favorite country hits will have you fixin' to get up and dance.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.

name: Pop Quiz: 80s Music Trivia
longDescription: Rewind to the raddest decade in music! It’s time to break out the leg warmers, tease that hair, and turn up the synth. From iconic power ballads to dancefloor-ready pop anthems, this neon-soaked trivia fest will test your knowledge of all things '80s. Whether you’re a die-hard Madonna fan, obsessed with Prince, or just here for the vibes, get ready to flex your retro song smarts and party like it’s 1989. Big hair is encouraged.

Whether or not you come away with a big cash prize, you'll leave this bingo night a winner.

After multiple rounds of shooting, a free-throw winner will be crowned and receive a special gift (and of course, bragging rights).

name: CTRL+ALT+DELUSION
longDescription: Ctrl+Alt+Delusion is a fast-paced trivia that dives into the internet’s most unhinged corners; fake headlines, AI fever dreams, and viral chaos you wish you could unsee. Compete in teams to decode clickbait, separate fact from fiction, and guess what the algorithm serves up next. With neon data tokens, meme-fuelled rounds, and misplaced confidence, this is the digital-age quiz you never saw coming (probably because it was shadow-banned).

longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

name: Electric
longDescription: It’s a full-sensory glow-up! Step into Electric, Virgin Voyages’ signature neon party, where black lights beam, performers lead the fun, and photo ops pop. Throw on your brightest neon and dance the night away—because this party lives up to its name.

name: 8 Legs Run Club
longDescription: Join the 8 legs Run Club! From first-time joggers to seasoned sprinters – this vibrant, inclusive group invites everyone to enjoy daily self-guided sessions of movement, motivation, and community. Our Happenings Cast kick off this healthy hangout by bringing together travelers of all fitness levels, with a balance of camaraderie, friendly challenges, and shared goals. Each session is designed to energize and connect every member on their fitness journey throughout the voyage.

name: 90s Boy Band Dance Class
longDescription: The synchronized lasso. That jerky elbow shuffle thing. The obligatory finger-point — these endearing dance moves à la everyone’s favorite boy bands (remember 5ive?!) were all the rage during the Y2K-era and now’s your time to turn it up higher than 98º as our onboard influencers lead a jam-filled session transforming you into the next Timberlake. And even if you end up sidelining Fatone-style, you’re sure to get a hearty dose of totally 90s nostalgia while flexing some *iconic* moves.

The questions continue until just one person is left standing!

name: Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia
longDescription: From Beatlemania to Britpop and beyond, this is your moment to salute the UK hitmakers who stormed the American charts. "Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia" celebrates the British invasion(s) that had the world singing from powerhouse vocals to unforgettable anthems. Test your knowledge of the artists who waved the Union Jack all the way to number one. Cheeky, chart-topping, and oh-so-Virgin this is trivia with a British accent and a global legacy.

name: -Up With A Twist: A Sumptuous Dinner & Show Experience - Book on Board! ($USD)
Guest Artist: Taylor Reed
longDescription: Hailing from Tampa, FL, Taylor Reed channels her natural creativity and spontaneity through a looping station, building an elegantly layered, engrossingly soulful sound. Weaving violin melodies, bold and invigorating percussion, and angelic vocals through groove-infused creations, her pop/R&B music elevates any space.

name: Salty Trivia: Bevvies and Bites
longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. Each team will have a booklet to fill out for each round of 10 questions. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book,"  it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

name: Red Hot
longDescription: Red Hot is a turbo-charged tribute to Virgin’s fearless legacy, blazing with iconic music, explosive choreography, and high-tech spectacle. From Branson’s rebel spirit to some of Virgin Records’ greatest hits, this show delivers pure energy and joy.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
Standby line will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.

name: Risky Quizness
longDescription: Teams get together to play rounds of trivia for the chance to fill your jar with golden barnacles. One Sailor from the winning team of each round will get a chance to face what we call “Trial-by-Trivia” and spin the wheel. Will you lose a team member? Have the chance to sing for extra points? With wild challenges and hilarious twists, it’s far from your average trivia game.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

name: Pink Agave After Dark
longDescription: Get your glow on in Pink Agave’s after hours agave lounge. With our resident DJ setting the mood to start your night on the right foot — or end it (dancing) in style.
needToKnows: A reservation at Pink Agave is recommended to attend this event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event.

name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

name: Unique Duo
longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

name: Club Night Featuring Queen HD the DJ
longDescription: Queen HD The DJ is a high-energy, self-taught Baltimore DJ known for sharp scratching and nostalgic grooves. She’s battled in NYC, DC, and Atlanta, and DJed globally from London to Botswana. She’s the official DJ for the Washington Spirit, spun for Team USA Soccer, and made history as the first queer Black woman to DJ on the White House South Lawn. Expect an electrifying set that blends nostalgia with unstoppable energy.
